summary: A React + TypeScript single-page "Valentine's" microsite with a follower-facing "wishlink" tool: users can generate/share a clean, mobile-compatible link that personalizes the site by swapping the displayed girlfriend/crush name (default: "Radhika") while keeping all other visuals and behaviors unchanged, and includes a main-page CTA link labeled "make your own üíó" that redirects to the tool page.
architectural_notes: Frontend is a Vite-style React SPA (ReactDOM.createRoot) using TypeScript and component-level local state (no backend queries required for the main UX).
Styling uses TailwindCSS with OKLCH-based CSS variables and dark mode via the `class` strategy; custom keyframes/utilities drive animations (float, heartbeat, glow, scale-in, shimmer, emoji bounce).
Animations are implemented as fixed-position overlay components (FloatingHearts, CelebrationHearts, SmilingEmojiAnimation) layered via z-index and `pointer-events: none`.
Interactive UI behavior is encapsulated in `ValentineCard` using refs + DOM measurements to reposition the "No" button within container bounds.
Authentication is implemented as a React Context provider (`InternetIdentityProvider`) wrapping the app; it uses `@dfinity/auth-client` and ICP SDK identities, with delegation validity checks.

Canister actor instantiation is wrapped by a `useActor` hook using `@tanstack/react-query` caching keyed by principal, with global invalidation/refetch of dependent queries when identity/actor changes.
Backend code is Motoko with a modular design: a `Storage` module for state/authorization/cycle top-up utilities and a `Mixin` providing shared/query methods intended to be mixed into a canister.
Runtime configuration was centralized via a dedicated frontend config module (e.g., `frontend/src/config.ts`) rather than ad-hoc environment access in hooks.
A `build-template/` scaffold was added to support reproducible packaging/deployment (ICP canister YAML, deploy scripts, and a preconfigured shadcn/ui-based frontend template).
Frontend now includes generated/typed backend canister declarations (`declarations/*.did.*`) and a small `StorageClient` helper to encapsulate blob-storage interactions via the actor hook.
known_issues: Two different `index.css` files exist (`frontend/src/index.css` and `frontend/index.css`) with different variable sets; depending on build configuration this may cause confusion or unused/incorrect styling if the wrong file is bundled.

Tool route is not opening: navigating to the intended Create Link page (e.g., `/#/tool` or `/tool`) redirects back to the main Valentine front page, indicating a routing configuration/route registration issue (hash vs browser routing or missing route).

Confirmed in production that navigating to the tool hash route still redirects to the front page (example failing URL: https://hass-matt-pagli-pyaar-ho-jayega-ag-cdv.caffeine.xyz/#/tool), indicating the router/hosting still isn‚Äôt serving or recognizing the /#/tool route as intended.
After deploying v26, the Create Link (/ #/tool) page still does not load for the user (tool route issue persists).

existing_features.title: Romantic Valentine landing page layout
existing_features.description: Renders a full-screen, scrollable layout with a fixed romantic gradient background image, centered main content area, fade-in entrance, and a footer credit line.

existing_features.title: Floating hearts ambient background animation
existing_features.description: Displays an always-on overlay of randomly sized/positioned hearts that continuously float upward with varying opacity, duration, and delays to create depth.

existing_features.title: Interactive Valentine card with evasive "No" button
existing_features.description: Shows a Valentine proposal card addressed to "Radhika". Clicking "No" cycles through playful messages and moves the button to a new random position within calculated container bounds using DOM measurements via refs.

existing_features.title: "Yes" acceptance flow with response screen
existing_features.description: Clicking "Yes" transitions the card into a celebratory response state ("Yay!" message). When celebration is enabled it displays a kissing-couple image instead of the default heart icon.

existing_features.title: Celebration hearts burst overlay
existing_features.description: On celebration, spawns a set of hearts that rise from the bottom with randomized sizes/timing and clears them after the animation completes.

existing_features.title: Smiling emoji celebration overlay
existing_features.description: On celebration, spawns multiple smiley emoji images that bounce upward with randomized x-positions and delays, then clears after completion.

existing_features.title: TailwindCSS theming, dark mode, and custom animation utilities
existing_features.description: Defines OKLCH CSS variable-based color tokens for light/dark modes, Tailwind config extensions, and custom keyframes/utilities for heartbeat, glow, scale-in, shimmer, float-up, celebration-rise, and emoji-bounce; includes mobile/touch interaction tweaks.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication context
existing_features.description: Provides a React Context with `login`, `clear`, and identity state. Initializes an `AuthClient`, loads stored identity on mount, performs login via Internet Identity with long TTL delegation, and supports logout/error states.

existing_features.title: ICP canister actor creation hook with React Query caching
existing_features.description: Creates an anonymous or authenticated canister actor depending on the current identity, caches it via React Query keyed by principal, and invalidates/refetches non-actor queries when the actor changes.

existing_features.title: Motoko blob-storage authorization and maintenance utilities (module + mixin)
existing_features.description: Implements Motoko utilities for maintaining a list of authorized gateway principals (fetched from a cashier canister), authorization checks, cycle top-up of the cashier using available cycles, storage blob liveness query, listing/pruning dead blobs with an explicit GC trigger, and returning an upload certificate payload.

existing_features.title: Local-only query placeholder
existing_features.description: Includes a minimal `useQueries.ts` that exports nothing, documenting that the app primarily manages state locally and does not require backend queries for core functionality.

existing_features.title: Fireworks celebration overlay animation
existing_features.description: Adds a fireworks-style overlay component used during the "Yes" celebration flow to enhance the celebratory visuals.

existing_features.title: Exportable build/deploy template with GitHub/ICP deployment support
existing_features.description: Includes a reusable build-template (frontend + backend canister YAML, env/config scaffolding, shadcn/ui component set, and deploy scripts/icp.yaml) to package and deploy the project via GitHub-based workflows and ICP tooling.

existing_features.title: Frontend typed backend bindings and StorageClient utility
existing_features.description: Adds generated/checked TypeScript bindings for the backend canister (DID declarations) plus a small frontend client utility to interact with blob-storage-related backend methods through the existing actor/auth setup.

existing_features.title: Build-template maintenance tooling (Docker + image optimization scripts + custom lint rules)
existing_features.description: Extends the exportable build-template with a Dockerfile, scripts to resize/prune unused images, and custom ESLint rules to enforce project conventions (e.g., avoiding BigInt in query keys and requiring the InternetIdentityProvider wrapper).
